headline: The Bull Case For Deckers Outdoor (DECK) Could Change Following HOKA’s Surge in Sales and Market Share
summary: In recent days, strong growth from Deckers Outdoor’s HOKA brand drove a 16.9 percent net sales increase for the company’s first quarter, as analysts highlighted rising HOKA brand preference among affluent female runners. HOKA and On are now positioned as the largest share gainers in the running sneaker space behind Nike, strengthening Deckers' industry standing. With HOKA’s impressive sales momentum in focus, we’ll explore how these developments influence Deckers’ broader investment...

headline: Q2 Earnings Roundup: Deckers (NYSE:DECK) And The Rest Of The Footwear Segment
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q2. Today, we are looking at footwear stocks, starting with Deckers (NYSE:DECK).
